document_data.name: Malaggar Tlabbar
document_data.mainbody: '''Malaggar Tlabbar''' was a [[drow]] of [[House Faen Tlabbar]], the fourth house of [[Menzoberranzan]] and head instructor of [[Melee-Magthere]].
document_data.History: Malaggar was the First Sword of Melee-Magthere in [[1372 DR]] and so the nominal head of the martial school. In that year, he coordinated with [[Matron mother|Matron]] [[Quenthel Baenre]] and the heads of the other schools to use their students to quell a slave uprising plotted by [[Syrzan]].
